description:
Nozaki, Chiyo, and Mikorin are all at Nozaki`s house working on manga, as usual. They finish a day`s worth of work, and Mikorin says he`s going to stay the night at Nozaki`s. Chiyo can`t help but be a bit jealous of Mikorin, and asks them what they usually do when they have sleepovers. Mikorin says that he asks Nozaki for advice about girls, but that ends up being...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Otoko ni wa, Tatakawanebanaranai, Toki ga Aru.
There Are Times When Men Must Fight.
男には, 戦わねばならない, 時がある.
